title: The migration multiplier
abstract: In the presence of sticky wages, the emigration of skilled workers from an area will directly reduce the number of unskilled jobs available. Demand for locally produced and sold goods will consequently fall and this may trigger further rises in unemployment and declines in income

        In the presence of sticky wages, the emigration of skilled workers from an area will directly reduce the number of unskilled jobs available.
